name: American Indian Child Resource Center
description: The American Indian Child Resource Center (AICRC) is a non-profit social services and educational community-based organization serving American Indian community members from across the greater Oakland/San Francisco Bay Area and surrounding counties. They help American Indian children and families by providing family support services and youth services.
